message: So do Cunha and Temer, 77% want Cunha gone, and he is corrupt in Petrobras to the tune of $5 MILLION. Temer has criminal ties too. Nothing about that though. She did what many right wing politicians in Brazil did, but she is left wing, so it is ok. Oh, and when congressmen dedicate their vote to the dictatorship, you lose credibility.

I'd rather die fighting against this tyrannical and corrupt government who doesn't have the balls to tell the people the truth, that many of the """"conspiracies"""" are true. That officials are being sold out to the richest families in the world. It's the beginning of the end.
